name: Basically a periodic Table Game (jam version)
name_original: Basically a periodic Table Game (jam version)
description:
Get Hydrogen, upgrade, get helium and lithium, etc.

This is incomplete. The endgame is 10 Lithium…

Also playable here:

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/717813091/

Sadly, most features are incomplete and if you are wondering why this is different than the other entries, it is because this is all I could think of. I am sorry if it doesn’t fit the alchemy theme…
